ing: 3 cloves garlic, minced and mashed (or more to taste)
des: "This is a very quick aioli I made when I couldn't find one to make in just a few minutes. It needs time in the fridge to allow the flavors to blend. Perfect on grilled and fried fish."
ins: Stir mayonnaise, garlic, lemon juice, and cayenne pepper together in a small bowl. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
